data.name: Mia Lounge Chair
data.overview: Discover a sense of sophisticated luxury with the sculptural shape of the Mia Lounge Chair - Swivel. A fresh take on the traditional lounge chair, the softly upholstered curves, and the intricate details of Mia creates a grandiose feel of modern elegance in any space.
details: Solid powder coated brass metal legs

data.name: Javert Lounge Chair
data.overview: Set in the grandeur of simplicity, the Javert Lounge Chair will encapsulate you in an aura of refined sophistication. Subtle yet elegant, the geometric, modern silhouette and sumptuous, sustainable materials of the Javert collection represent a timeless balance.
details: Available in solid ash wood with ebony finish

data.name: Egg Chair
data.overview: The famed Egg Chair is an undeniably iconic piece inspired by modern Danish design. Its fluid lines create a sense of movement that could only be considered as part of the Organic Functionalism movement of the mid-century era. There is no unnecessary adornment so the chair is stunning in its simplicty of form. Durably cushioned, its curving structure conforms to the body. It also tilts and swivels 360°, making it even more welcoming for a home or an office environment.
details: PU-injected foam wrapped in synthetic Dacron silk
360 degree swivel.Polished aluminum base resistant to chipping and flaking

data.name: Diane Sofa
data.overview: Fall back into the divine atmosphere of the Diane Sofa. Captivating with its sublime, modern silhouette and opulently lush, long-lasting materials, the Diane creates a sense of grace in any space.
details: Kiln-dried hardwood frame with dowelled joints and reinforced corner blocks
Soft-padded frame made with polyurethane foam wrapped in polyester fiber
3 layer high-density foam cushioning.Includes 4 black foot protectors
Includes two throw pillows.Soft Feel.Light assembly required

data.name: Tanner 3 Seater Sofa
data.overview: Fall back into the luxurious and supple feel of the Tanner 3 Seater Sofa. Meticulously crafted, the refined tufting and sumptuous cushioning of the Tanner create an inviting, sink-in feel, making it the ultimate relaxation experience. Enjoy our preset configurations or customize your own design by purchasing pieces separately.
details: Available as preset or custom modular configurations
Soft Feel (Learn more about our sofa firmness here.)
Modules can be used with legs or without
Only legs are detached for your convenience
Connectors not included/compatible for this collection

data.name: Evelyn Coffee Table - Marble - Rectangular
data.overview: Gorgeous marble and a handsome metal base are like the perfect homecoming pair. Made with your choice of durable Carrara or Black marble, the Evelyn Coffee Table is an immediately modern classic, simply designed and ready to bring home.
details: Solid marble top polished and finished with natural wax
Choose from black or painted brass metal legs
This product will be shipped in a wooden crate, tools are recommended for unboxing

data.name: Galen Coffee Table
data.overview: The modern, curved form and minute details unite to bring the Galen Coffee Table to life. Distinguished by its unique and timeless elegance the breathtaking essence of the Galen creates a sophisticated ambiance in any space, indoor or outdoor.
details: Choice of white, grey, or black concrete
Suitable for indoor or outdoor use
This product will be shipped in a wooden crate, tools are recommended for unboxing

data.name: Winston Media Console
data.overview: The Winston Media Console is an abstract presentation of the rule of thirds. Strangely but pleasantly balanced, this vibrant piece becomes a focal point with multiple storage opportunities. Aesthetic industrial lines meet crafted concave edges for an overall elegant and contemporary facade.
details: Italian-engineered soft-close drawers with grey aluminum handles
Powder coated grey solid stainless steel base

data.name: Mikkel TV Stand
data.overview: Conceal your cords and consoles with confidence in the Mikkel TV Stand. Three spacious drawers accommodate your storage needs effortlessly, while the modern form creates the perfect base for a wall-mounted or standing TV. This item utilizes a durable, solid Ash wood base and white lacquer finish for a strong foundation and sophisticated finish. Built for daily use, this item is a space efficient and affordable investment piece that can complement any home.
details: Choice of elm wood or walnut veneer
Interior dimensions: Drawer A: 20.5 x 12.75 x 5.5; Drawer B: 20.75 x 12.75 x 5.5; Drawer C: 20.5 x 12.75 x 5.5

data.name: Liza Pedestal
data.overview: The Liza Pedestal brings form and function to the modern home. With its clean and simple, architectural design, the Liza anchors any space. Made of beautifully polished marble, the Liza creates a feel of refined elegance in any setting.
details: Polished and finished with natural wax
This product will be shipped in a wooden crate, tools are recommended for unboxing

data.name: Tulip Side Table
data.overview: The Tulip Table series is a premium reproduction line inspired by Finnish and American mid-century architecture, a period vastly characterized by the simplification of everyday living. The unique single pedestal base is made from strong, durable cast aluminum to support your choice of table top whilst eliminating the unnecessary clutter of legs underneath.
details: Choice of marble, wood veneer, or painted lacquer surface
Marble tops are finished with natural sealant
Cast aluminum base with gloss finish
Base has 5-step powder coat resistant to chipping
This product will be shipped in a wooden crate, tools are recommended for unboxing

data.name: Ophelia Bed
data.overview: Everything from the smooth upholstery, plush cushioning, and rounded edges exude elegance in this modern contemporary bed frame. Fully upholstered with a neat wrap-around tuck, Ophelia is a simple luxury piece ready to take home. With a retreat, this cozy, don't blame us if it's harder to get out of bed in the morning.
details: Standard quality framing is secured with strong metal brackets
Full frame wrapped in triple layer multi-density foam cushioning

data.name: Milo Sleeper Sectional
data.overview: The sleek and flat profile of the Milo Sleeper Sectional marries sophisticated style with casual comfort. Milo's subtle curves of the padded armrest add visual elegance while delivering plush and stable support for the spacious seating. Milo features a modern design that can be easily converted into a spacious bed, perfect for when you have guests over. Much like the grandeur of Italian design, Milo is especially suited for large luxury spaces as the design of the Milo is formed with more width than the average sofa, providing an overall grander feel for your home.
details: Kiln-dried hardwood frame w/ doweled joints & reinforced corner blocks
Soft-padded frame made with polyurethane foam wrapped in polyester fiber
3-layer high-density foam cushioning topped w/ premium 100% goose feathers
Square throw pillows not included, sold separately here
Round, low profile solid stainless steel legs
Light assembly required. Only legs are detached for your convenience
Connectors not included/compatible for this collection

data.name: Vienna Dresser
data.overview: Echoing principles from the postmodern era, the Vienna Wide Dresser stands out in any bedroom. Enriched with a sumptuous alabaster finish that cascades down like an abundant waterfall; the Vienna is the perfect contemporary dresser that fits any design style. Pair with the Vienna Nightstand to complete your bedroom space.
details: This product will be shipped in a wooden crate, tools are recommended for unboxing

data.name: Georgio Wide Dresser
data.overview: Georgio is an unparalleled contemporary dresser, that captures the pure essence of modern luxury. Minute brass details and judiciously applied materials, accentuate the linear lines of the rich walnut slat detail and ebony drawer panels. The Georgio Wide Dresser is the perfect foundation for any bedroom. Complete your bedroom with the Georgio Bed and Georgio Nightstand.
details: Black oak veneer front drawer panels

data.name: Mila Mirror
data.overview: Bordered with a delicate frame of smooth metal, the Mila Mirror is an understated essential. Brightening any room with its minimalist and sophisticated silhouette, whether it’s hung over the vanity, bathroom sink or even in the living room, the Mila provides reflection whenever needed.
details: Choice of brass or black metal frame

data.name: Finn Mirror
data.overview: The nature of glass has the ability to transform small spaces into larger rooms, while the texture of natural wood creates a type of Scandinavian warmth. A beautiful piece designed for propping effortlessly against expansive walls, the Finn Mirror is both a practical object and decorative object of desire.
details: Choice of ash wood or walnut veneer
Leaning floor mirror, no hardware included

data.name: Hudson Mirror
data.overview: Like a work of art, the Hudson is transformed into a symbol of beauty. Adorned with a delicate metal frame and alluring marble base, the Hudson Mirror is simple yet elegant. From your living room to the hallway, the Hudson illuminates any space.
details: Choice of white or black marble
Leaning floor mirror, no hardware included
This product will be shipped in a wooden crate, tools are recommended for unboxing

data.name: Asha Rug - Rectangular
data.overview: With its soft expression and subtle details, the Asha Rug evokes the supple feeling of walking on a cloud. Inspired by the skilled artisans from the Ushak region of Turkey, these hand-tufted rugs made of sumptuously plush viscose add elegance and warmth to spaces large and small alike.

data.name: Sola Rug
data.overview: Captivating, the Sola Rug will transport you to an atmosphere of refined luxury. Accentuated by the minimal embossed pattern design the Sola adds a touch of luxuriant charm and depth to any space.

data.name: Square Throw Pillow
data.overview: Add character and coziness to any space with throw pillows in your choice of fabric. Filled with goose feathers for soft support.

data.name: Nova Pouf
data.overview: A complimentary piece to its larger counterpart, this size is raised slightly higher and kept narrower than our large version. The Nova Pouf acts as the perfect upholstered stool or cushioned side table. Softly padded for a comfortable seat and available in multiple fabric and color options, the Nova is the ideal accent piece to complete your space.
details: Upholstered frame padded with polyurethane foam wrapped in polyester fiber
